DownloadOurApp: Download Our App for Easy Banking

Subject: Subject
ProductObjCon: The Internet Banking Service is a tool to facilitate customers to access their bank accounts and manage their money online from different locations anytime they want.
BenefitForUser1: Perform financial transactions within BIC Accounts faster, anywhere, anytime.
BenefitForUser2: Amend transactions easily using Admin User privileges.
BenefitForUser3: Schedule automatic or future payment transactions.
BenefitForUser4: Process payroll for staff without extra bank fees.
BenefitForUser5: Monitor usage and review bank statements easily.
SpecificCon1: The user must have current account with BIC Bank.
SpecificCon2: Only an account holder or a person, who has been entitled by an account holder, can register for the service.
SpecificCon3: Before using the services, the user should accept terms and conditions and also complete the application form with reliable information. A power of attorney letter is required, if an account holder cannot register/apply by himself/herself while valid ID cards must be provided by both an account holder and his/her representative
